alert.note: Alert for Laurens; Southern Greenville; Southern Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 1:35AM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN LAURENS...SOUTHEASTERN GREENVILLE AND SOUTHWESTERN SPARTANBURG COUNTIES UNTIL 230 AM EDT... At 135 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a thunderstorm 12 miles southeast of Greenville Downtown, or 4 miles southwest of Simpsonville, moving east at 15 mph. Locations to be impacted include... Mauldin, Simpsonville, Fountain Inn, Piedmont, Gray Court, Donaldson Center, Woodruff, West Greenville, Fork Shoals and Hickory Tavern. Very heavy rainfall rates up to 2 inches per hour will be possible in these areas.
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall may flood areas with poor drainage, such as ditches and underpasses. Avoid these areas and do not cross flooded roads. Water levels of small streams may also rise rapidly. Seek higher ground if threatened by flood waters.
